author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
We're back with The Indie Hour Episode Thirty-Six! This series focuses on games you may have never even heard of and gives us an inside look at the wider world of independantly published Tabletop Wargames of all genres.

In 2024 our own indomitable MC and all-around Creative Malev ran the One Box Wargame challenge (sponsored by the lovely folks at Wargames Atlantic). The goal; use a single box of models available in the market today and write a whole game around them. His own entry; GREATHELM is now poised to launch as a fully fleshed out project. Let's dive in!

Check out the rulebook in digital  HERE: https://www.patreon.com/malev
title: The GMG Indie Hour Ep 036 - GREATHELM  by Malev
